Klasse Stack<T>

java.lang.Object
stack.Stack<T>
Typparameter:
T - the type of elements stored in the stack
public class Stack<T> extends Object
Generic stack implementation using an array.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren
    Konstruktor
    Beschreibung
    Stack()
    Default constructor.
    Stack(int capacity)
    Constructor with custom capacity.

    Modifikator und Typ
    Methode
    Beschreibung
    String
    list()
    Returns all elements separated by semicolons.
    T
    peek()
    Returns the top element without removing it.
    T
    pop()
    Removes and returns the top element.

    Pushes an element onto the stack.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Stack

      public Stack()
      Default constructor. Creates a stack with capacity 10.

    • Stack

      public Stack(int capacity)
      Constructor with custom capacity.
      Parameter:
      capacity - maximum number of elements

  • Methodendetails

    • push

      public void push(T value) throws StackFullException
      Pushes an element onto the stack.
      Parameter:
      value - element to push
      Löst aus:
      StackFullException - if the stack is full

    • pop

      public T pop() throws StackEmptyException
      Removes and returns the top element.
      Gibt zurück:
      top element
      Löst aus:
      StackEmptyException - if the stack is empty

    • peek

      public T peek() throws StackEmptyException
      Returns the top element without removing it.
      Gibt zurück:
      top element
      Löst aus:
      StackEmptyException - if the stack is empty

    • list

      public String list()
      Returns all elements separated by semicolons.
      Gibt zurück:
      concatenated stack elements
